blocks.data:
# Regex Input

Allows you to display regex input controls for your widget. Regex setting can capture and provide conditional state to other schema settings.

## JSON Schema

type.description: The type of setting component to display.

label.description: The user friendly message to inform the user how this setting will be used.

id.description: The variable name where the setting value will be available in the widget template.

default.description: The default value to use when rendering the widget for the first time.

typeMeta.description: Additional information needed based on the selected setting type.

placeholder.description: Placeholder text in the text editor.
